TEXT.French: Villes dans les cœurs historiques étrangers

TEXT.English: %s1 no longer recognizes our overlordship and declares sovereignty!
TEXT.French: %s1 ne reconnaît plus votre suzeraineté et affirme sa souveraineté !
TEXT.German: %s1 no longer recognizes our overlordship and declares sovereignty!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 no longer recognizes our overlordship and declares sovereignty!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 no longer recognizes our overlordship and declares sovereignty!

TEXT.English: %s1 has canceled their defensive pact with us!
TEXT.French: %s1 a annulé son pacte de défense avec nous !
TEXT.German: %s1 has canceled their defensive pact with us!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has canceled their defensive pact with us!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has canceled their defensive pact with us!

TEXT.English: %s1 no longer wishes to be our vassal!
TEXT.French: %s1 ne souhaite plus être notre vassal !
TEXT.German: %s1 no longer wishes to be our vassal!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 no longer wishes to be our vassal!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 no longer wishes to be our vassal!

TEXT.English: %s1 has canceled their open borders agreement with us!
TEXT.French: %s1 a annulé son accord de libre passage avec nous !
TEXT.German: %s1 has canceled their open borders agreement with us!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has canceled their open borders agreement with us!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has canceled their open borders agreement with us!

TEXT.English: If our stability does not improve, we will lose a stability level at the next check
TEXT.French: Si notre stabilité ne s'améliore pas, nous perdrons un niveau de stabilité à la prochaine vérification
TEXT.German: If our stability does not improve, we will lose a stability level at the next check
TEXT.Italian: If our stability does not improve, we will lose a stability level at the next check
TEXT.Spanish: If our stability does not improve, we will lose a stability level at the next check

TEXT.English: Unless our stability decreases, we will gain a stability level at the next check
TEXT.French: À moins que notre stabilité ne diminue d'ici là, nous gagnerons un niveau de stabilité à la prochaine vérification
TEXT.German: Unless our stability decreases, we will gain a stability level at the next check
TEXT.Italian: Unless our stability decreases, we will gain a stability level at the next check
TEXT.Spanish: Unless our stability decreases, we will gain a stability level at the next check

TEXT.English: Central Planning: Trade with Free Market Civilizations
TEXT.French: Économie planifiée : commerce avec des civilisations adeptes du libre marché
TEXT.German: Central Planning: Trade with Free Market Civilizations
TEXT.Italian: Central Planning: Trade with Free Market Civilizations
TEXT.Spanish: Central Planning: Trade with Free Market Civilizations

TEXT.English: Check the Interior Advisor (F2) for details
TEXT.French: Consulter le Conseiller aux affaires intérieures (F2) pour de plus amples détails
TEXT.Italian: Per avere ulteriori dettagli consulta il Consigliere per gli interni (F2)
TEXT.Spanish: Revisa el Consejero de Interior [F2] para obtener más detalles.

TEXT.English: Your empire is descending into civil war!
TEXT.French: Votre empire entre en guerre civile !
TEXT.German: Euer Reich steht vor einem Bürgerkrieg!
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo impero sta per cadere nella guerra civile!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu imperio está sufriendo una guerra civil!

TEXT.English: We are losing control over our entire empire!
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en train de perdre le contrôle de l'empire au grand complet !
TEXT.German: We are losing control over our entire empire!
TEXT.Italian: We are losing control over our entire empire!
TEXT.Spanish: We are losing control over our entire empire!

TEXT.English: If our stability does not improve, we will experience a crisis at the next stability check!
TEXT.French: Si notre stabilité ne s'améliore pas, nous traverserons une crise à la prochaine vérification de stabilité !
TEXT.German: If our stability does not improve, we will experience a crisis at the next stability check!
TEXT.Italian: If our stability does not improve, we will experience a crisis at the next stability check!
TEXT.Spanish: If our stability does not improve, we will experience a crisis at the next stability check!

TEXT.English: Our civilization is experiencing a %s1 %s2 crisis!
TEXT.German: Our civilization is experiencing a %s1 %s2 crisis!
TEXT.Italian: Our civilization is experiencing a %s1 %s2 crisis!
TEXT.Spanish: Our civilization is experiencing a %s1 %s2 crisis!

TEXT.French: Nos relations avec la civilisation : %s1 se sont détériorées !

TEXT.English: instability caused by transition to democracy!
TEXT.French: d'instabilité causée par la transition démocratique !
TEXT.German: Instabilität, verursacht durch den Wechsel zur Demokratie!
TEXT.Italian: instabilità, causata dal passaggio alla democrazia!
TEXT.Spanish: inestabilidad causada por la transición a la democracia.

TEXT.English: Our civilization is descending into a period of civil war!
TEXT.French: Notre civilisation sombre dans une période de guerre civile !
TEXT.German: Our civilization is descending into a period of civil war!
TEXT.Italian: Our civilization is descending into a period of civil war!
TEXT.Spanish: Our civilization is descending into a period of civil war!

TEXT.English: The economic crisis is impeding our cottage growth!
TEXT.French: La crise économique ralentit la croissance de nos cottages !
TEXT.German: The economic crisis is impeding our cottage growth!
TEXT.Italian: The economic crisis is impeding our cottage growth!
TEXT.Spanish: The economic crisis is impeding our cottage growth!

TEXT.English: The economic crisis is paralyzing our civilization!
TEXT.French: La crise économique paralyse notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: The economic crisis is paralyzing our civilization!
TEXT.Italian: The economic crisis is paralyzing our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The economic crisis is paralyzing our civilization!

TEXT.English: We are losing control over our foreign territory!
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en train de perdre le contrôle de nos territoires à l'étranger !
TEXT.German: We are losing control over our foreign territory!
TEXT.Italian: We are losing control over our foreign territory!
TEXT.Spanish: We are losing control over our foreign territory!

TEXT.English: The period of Great Depression in the %s1 is negatively influencing our economy!
TEXT.French: La période de Grande Dépression en %s1 influence négativement notre économie !
TEXT.German: Die Phase der Großen Depression im %s1:2 Reich hat negative Auswirkungen auf unsere Wirtschaft!
TEXT.Italian: Il periodo di Grande Depressione nell'%s1 sta influenzando negativamente la nostra economia!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡El periodo de Gran Depresión de %s1 está afectando negativamente a nuestra economía!

TEXT.English: The period of Great Depression in the
TEXT.French: La période de Grande Dépression en
TEXT.German: Die Phase der Großen Depression in
TEXT.Italian: Il periodo di Grande Depressione nel
TEXT.Spanish: El periodo de Gran Depresión del

TEXT.German: hat negative Auswirkungen auf unsere Wirtschaft!
TEXT.Italian: sta influenzando negativamente la nostra economia!
TEXT.Spanish: está afectando negativamente a nuestra economía.

TEXT.English: Due to the military crisis, we have temporarily lost control over our units!
TEXT.French: À cause de la crise militaire, nous avons temporairement perdu le contrôle de nos unités militaires !
TEXT.German: Due to the military crisis, we have temporarily lost control over our units!
TEXT.Italian: Due to the military crisis, we have temporarily lost control over our units!
TEXT.Spanish: Due to the military crisis, we have temporarily lost control over our units!

TEXT.English: Isolationism: no Cities outside of Core Area
TEXT.French: Isolationnisme : pas de villes en dehors du cœur historique
TEXT.German: Isolationism: no Cities outside of Core Area
TEXT.Italian: Isolationism: no Cities outside of Core Area
TEXT.Spanish: Isolationism: no Cities outside of Core Area

TEXT.English: Due to our economic crisis we have lost %d1[ICON_GOLD] and %d2[ICON_RESEARCH]!
TEXT.French: La crise économique que nous traversons nous a fait perdre %d1[ICON_GOLD] et %d2[ICON_RESEARCH] !
TEXT.German: Due to our economic crisis we have lost %d1[ICON_GOLD] and %d2[ICON_RESEARCH]!
TEXT.Italian: Due to our economic crisis we have lost %d1[ICON_GOLD] and %d2[ICON_RESEARCH]!
TEXT.Spanish: Due to our economic crisis we have lost %d1[ICON_GOLD] and %d2[ICON_RESEARCH]!

TEXT.English: We have lost control over our territory around %s1!
TEXT.French: Nous avons perdu le contrôle du territoire près de %s1 !
TEXT.German: We have lost control over our territory around %s1!
TEXT.Italian: We have lost control over our territory around %s1!
TEXT.Spanish: We have lost control over our territory around %s1!

TEXT.French: Mercantilisme : commerce des avec des civilisations plus riches

TEXT.English: If our stability does not change, the stability level will remain constant at the next check
TEXT.French: À moins que notre stabilité ne change d'ici là, notre niveau de stabilité demeureura constant lors de la prochaine vérification
TEXT.German: If our stability does not change, the stability level will remain constant at the next check
TEXT.Italian: If our stability does not change, the stability level will remain constant at the next check
TEXT.Spanish: If our stability does not change, the stability level will remain constant at the next check

TEXT.English: Your empire is experiencing a period of
TEXT.German: Euer Reich durchlebt eine Phase der
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo impero sta vivendo un periodo di
TEXT.Spanish: Tu imperio está pasando por un periodo de

TEXT.English: The military crisis leaves our cities without effective defenses!
TEXT.French: La crise militaire laisse nos villes sans défenses efficaces !
TEXT.German: The military crisis leaves our cities without effective defenses!
TEXT.Italian: The military crisis leaves our cities without effective defenses!
TEXT.Spanish: The military crisis leaves our cities without effective defenses!

TEXT.English: The economic crisis is preventing the emergence of great people!
TEXT.French: La crise économique empêche l'apparition de personnages illustres !
TEXT.German: The economic crisis is preventing the emergence of great people!
TEXT.Italian: The economic crisis is preventing the emergence of great people!
TEXT.Spanish: The economic crisis is preventing the emergence of great people!

TEXT.English: Unhappy cities are leaving our civilization!
TEXT.French: Nos villes malheureuses quittent notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Unhappy cities are leaving our civilization!
TEXT.Italian: Unhappy cities are leaving our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: Unhappy cities are leaving our civilization!

TEXT.English: Cities sympathetic to the enemy are in open revolt!
TEXT.French: Celles de nos villes qui sympathisent avec l'ennemi sont en rébellion !
TEXT.German: Cities sympathetic to the enemy are in open revolt!
TEXT.Italian: Cities sympathetic to the enemy are in open revolt!
TEXT.Spanish: Cities sympathetic to the enemy are in open revolt!

TEXT.English: The military crisis led to the desertion of %d1 units!
TEXT.French: La crise militaire a mené à la désertion d'unités %d1 !
TEXT.German: The military crisis led to the desertion of %d1 units!
TEXT.Italian: The military crisis led to the desertion of %d1 units!
TEXT.Spanish: The military crisis led to the desertion of %d1 units!

TEXT.French: Théocratie : combattre des frères de foi

TEXT.English: The %s1 is going through a period of instability, and %d2 cities have seceded from their civilization!
TEXT.French: La civilisation : %s1 traverse une période d'instabilité, et %d2 de ses villes ont fait sécession !
TEXT.German: The %s1 is going through a period of instability, and %d2 cities have seceded from their civilization!
TEXT.Italian: The %s1 is going through a period of instability, and %d2 cities have seceded from their civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1 is going through a period of instability, and %d2 cities have seceded from their civilization!

TEXT.English: Our civilisation is collapsing! Unless our stability improves, we are in danger of a complete collapse.
TEXT.French: Notre civilisation est en train de s'effondrer ! Si nous n'améliorons pas notre stabilité, nous risquons un effondrement total.
TEXT.German: Our civilisation is collapsing! Unless our stability improves, we are in danger of a complete collapse.
TEXT.Italian: Our civilisation is collapsing! Unless our stability improves, we are in danger of a complete collapse.
TEXT.Spanish: Our civilisation is collapsing! Unless our stability improves, we are in danger of a complete collapse.
